description: The House celebrates a night of debauchery and sexual service with guest of honor Derrick Pierce. The slaves take turns attempting to please Mr. Pierce, but he runs through them just to start from the beginning of the process again. The slaves are used on each other as well, and chrome is fisted by kaos for the first time. Now that the Steward has given them a bit of a break it's back to serving the House and Mr. Pierce.
title: House Party: Debauchery
